recipes.title: Classic Pancakes
recipes.description: Fluffy traditional pancakes perfect for breakfast.
instructions: In a large bowl, sift together the flour, baking powder, salt, and sugar.
Make a well in the center and pour in the milk, egg,  and melted butter; mix until smooth.
Heat a lightly oiled griddle or frying pan over medium-high heat. Pour or scoop the batter onto the griddle.
Brown on both sides and serve hot.

recipes.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.description: An Italian pasta dish from Rome made with egg, hard cheese, pancetta, and pepper.
ingredients: Salt and freshly ground black pepper
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Meanwhile, fry the pancetta (and garlic, if desired) in a pan until crispy.
Beat the eggs in a bowl, add grated Parmesan, and mix well.
Drain the spaghetti, reserving some cooking water. Quickly toss the pasta with the pancetta,then remove from heat.
Stir in the egg-cheese mixture, adding pasta water if needed for creaminess.
Season with pepper and serve immediately.
